Input Groups

Basic example Place one add-on or button on either side of an input.

@

@example.com

$ .00

https://example.com/users/

Sizing Add the relative sizing classes to the input group itself.

@

@

@

Checkboxes and Radio Buttons Place any checkbox or radio option within an input group's addon (instead of text!).


Button Addons Buttons in input groups are a bit different and require one extra level of nesting. Instead of .input-group-addon, you'll need to use .input-group-btn to wrap the buttons.
